# detachToWindow

**Type Property**

Specifies that the popover has been closed because it is being detached to a window.

## Declaration

```swift
static let detachToWindow: NSPopover.CloseReason
```

## Constants

- **standard**: Specifies that the popover has been closed in a standard way.

items.description: Specifies that the popover has been closed in a standard way.
items.name: standard
